text: Watir Quta (Aymara watiri darner, someone who darns holes in clothes, quta lake, see: Zurcidor, ra "darner lake", also spelled Bater Kkota) is a lake in the Andes of Bolivia. It is situated in the La Paz Department, Inquisivi Province, Quime Municipality. The river Chaka Jawira which connects Watir Quta with the lakes south-east of it flows through the lake. Its waters run to the La Paz River.IGM map 1:50,000 6143-IV Estancia Choquetanga Chico == References == Category:Lakes of La Paz Department (Bolivia)
title: Watir Quta
